snippet: Paul Gaines said he did not want his daughter Victoria’s death in a July 4 accident to have been in vain.
abstract: Parents of one of the three children who died when a cabin cruiser capsized in Long Island Sound on July 4 call for the Coast Guard to enhance its regulation of recreational boats; Paul Gaines says he does not want his daughter Victoria's death to have been in vain; Victoria was one of 27 people, including 10 children, on board the 34-foot cruiser to view a fireworks display.
lead_paragraph: Paul Gaines said he did not want his daughter Victoria’s death in a July 4 accident to have been in vain.

headline.seo: Parents of Child Killed in Capsized Boat Call for New Rules
headline.main: Parents of Child Killed in Capsized Boat Ask for New Rules
headline.print_headline: Parents of Child Killed in Capsized Boat Ask for New Rules
